snippet: DURST--David. The Board of Directors and staff of the Hebrew Free Loan Society mourn the passing of David Durst, whose unparalleled generosity changed the course of countless lives. David expressed his deep devotion to the Jewish community through his work with HFLS, where he provided leadership in many ways, including serving as board President for a decade. We extend our heartfelt condolences to David's beloved children, Jody, Joshua, Kristoffer, Laurel, and Robin; his wife Carola; his grandchildren; and the entire family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: DURST--David. The Board of Directors and staff of the Hebrew Free Loan Society mourn the passing of David Durst, whose unparalleled generosity changed the course of countless lives. David expressed his deep devotion to the Jewish community through his work with HFLS, where he provided leadership in many ways, including serving as board President for a decade. We extend our heartfelt condolences to David's beloved children, Jody, Joshua, Kristoffer, Laurel, and Robin; his wife Carola; his grandchildren; and the entire family. 1/3
